# Copilot Instructions for natalierharris/natalierharris

## Repository Overview
This is a GitHub profile repository. The README.md file is displayed on the GitHub profile page at https://github.com/natalierharris.

## Tech Stack
- HTML5 for the index.html page
- Markdown for README.md

## File Structure
- `README.md`: Profile README displayed on GitHub profile page
- `index.html`: Simple HTML page
- `.github/agents/`: Custom agent definitions

## Coding Guidelines

### General Principles
- Keep content simple and maintainable
- Follow standard HTML5 and Markdown best practices
- Ensure all content is appropriate for a public profile

### HTML Files
- Use semantic HTML5 elements
- Include proper meta tags (charset, viewport)
- Maintain accessibility standards
- Keep inline styles minimal; prefer external CSS if styling becomes complex

### Markdown Files
- Follow GitHub Flavored Markdown syntax
- Use clear, concise language
- Maintain consistent formatting
- Profile README should be welcoming and informative

### Links
- Always use HTTPS for external links
- Verify links are valid before committing
- Use relative paths for internal repository links

## Conventions
- File names: Use lowercase with hyphens for separation (kebab-case)
- Indentation: 4 spaces for HTML files, 2 spaces for Markdown lists
- Line endings: LF (Unix-style)

## Common Tasks
- Updating profile information: Edit README.md
- Modifying the HTML page: Edit index.html
- Managing custom agents: Add/edit files in `.github/agents/`

## Quality Standards
- All HTML must be valid HTML5
- All Markdown must render correctly on GitHub
- Content should be professional and accurate
- No sensitive information or credentials should be committed
